summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of BariWiki application. All backend APIs (16/16) passed successfully. Frontend testing completed with all core features working correctly including admin login, dashboard, term creation, publishing, A-Z navigation, categories, search, and term pages.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint
Backend: Stats endpoint (returns correct counts)
Backend: Admin login with valid credentials
Backend: Admin login rejects invalid credentials
Backend: Create term via API
Backend: List admin terms with pagination
Backend: Get term by ID
Backend: Update term
Backend: Publish term
Backend: Public list terms (filtered by status)
Backend: Get letters with counts for A-Z navigation
Backend: Get categories with counts
Backend: Search terms by query
Backend: Get terms by letter
Backend: Get terms by category
Backend: Delete term
Frontend: Homepage loads with title, search bar, stats cards
Frontend: Admin login flow (redirects to dashboard)
Frontend: Admin dashboard displays stats correctly
Frontend: Navigate to Add Term page
Frontend: Create new term manually via form
Frontend: View all terms in admin panel
Frontend: Import page loads with file upload
Frontend: Public homepage displays published terms
Frontend: A-Z navigation works (letter S with published term)
Frontend: Category page displays terms grouped alphabetically
Frontend: Individual term page displays content correctly
Frontend: Search functionality returns results
Frontend: Header navigation with logo and search
